result.reason: The user requests a confirmation prompt when closing docked panels (like Connections or Config) to prevent accidental closure, similar to the existing warning for connection tabs.
result.approach: Add a 'Warn when closing panels' setting in Options > Tabs & Panels. Override OnFormClosing in BaseWindow (base class for panels) to check this setting and show a confirmation dialog.
